entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is a person who has attempted to strangle three people. He is mentioned as having a conversation with the Prime Minister.

entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is a position that Scrimgeour is speaking to. The Prime Minister is anxious about someone's well-being.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who has consented to stay on in an advisory capacity. He attempts to smile but is unsuccessful.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour is speaking to the Prime Minister.
Fudge has consented to stay on in an advisory capacity for Scrimgeour.
